original_title: Jean-Michel le caribou et les histoires d'amour interdites
overview: Marcel, the mayor, decides to ban love stories: it only causes problems and makes everyone unhappy! Banning love stories? Jean-Michel is not too much for it and his girlfriend Gisèle even less... Unfortunately, the repression begins. Our heroes decide to join the resistance so that love is once again allowed in the village.
title: Jean-Michel le caribou et les histoires d'amour interdites
